Text:
David George Green directed one film named "Undertow" with the cast as listed here but it's from 2004, not 1994 :
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0360130/

Well I could say I used the wrong date to see if anyone was noticing but . . .    You're absolutely correct.  Undertow was released in 2004 and I used the wrong date.  Jamie Bell isn't that old.  My bad.  Thanks for correcting me.  I'll be more careful in future uploads.

simple to rename, just press the little red X above the torrent and delete it. 

Re-upload it and name it correctly. It does not affect those currently downloading or seeding.
